Research Themes

Our research themes at IITJ Aide School are at the forefront of addressing global challenges and driving innovation in various fields. These themes represent our commitment to pushing the boundaries of knowledge and making a tangible impact on society.

Research Themes Projects Publications Facilities & Labs

AI and Economics

Sociodigital Reality (AR, VR, Haptics, Speech and Language Analysis)
Visual Computing (Computer Vision, Visual Forensics, Machine Learning)
Signal Processing for IoT (Predictive Maintenance, Digital Twin, Communication)


Associated Laboratories

  • Signal Processing Lab
  • Image Processing & Computer Vision Lab
  • Multimodal Interaction Lab

AI for Technology: Language and Vision

Multi-agent system Oxide metal semiconductors by sputtering for sensor applications
2D materials: MoS2, AlGaN/GaN HEMTs

Micro and Nano device fabrications
